typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_Comment} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_PostHistoryTypeId} as long,
		{_PostId} as long,
		{_RevisionGUID} as string,
		{_Text} as string,
		{_UserDisplayName} as string,
		{_UserId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPostHistory
source(output(
		{_AcceptedAnswerId} as long,
		{_AnswerCount} as long,
		{_Body} as string,
		{_ClosedDate} as string,
		{_CommentCount} as long,
		{_CommunityOwnedDate} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_FavoriteCount} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastActivityDate} as string,
		{_LastEditDate} as string,
		{_LastEditorDisplayName} as string,
		{_LastEditorUserId} as long,
		{_OwnerDisplayName} as string,
		{_OwnerUserId} as long,
		{_ParentId} as long,
		{_PostTypeId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Tags} as string,
		{_Title} as string,
		{_ViewCount} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPost
Sort1 aggregate(groupBy(PostHId),
	each(match(name!='PostHId'), $$ = toString(first($$)))) ~> Distinct
Select2 sort(desc(CreationDate, true)) ~> Sort1
Distinct, Select exists(PostHId == PostId && Text == PostContent,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
SrcPost select(mapColumn(
		PostId = {_Id},
		PostContent = {_Body}
	)) ~> Select
SrcPostHistory select(mapColumn(
		PostHistoryId = {_Id},
		PostHId = {_PostId},
		RevisionGUID = {_RevisionGUID},
		Text = {_Text},
		UserDisplayName = {_UserDisplayName},
		CreationDate = {_CreationDate}
	)) ~> Select2
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> DestHistoryDinstinctPost

source(output(
		{_AboutMe} as string,
		{_AccountId} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_DisplayName} as string,
		{_DownVotes} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastAccessDate} as string,
		{_Location} as string,
		{_ProfileImageUrl} as string,
		{_Reputation} as long,
		{_UpVotes} as long,
		{_Views} as long,
		{_WebsiteUrl} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcUsers
source(output(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcDimUser
SelectCleaningName, FilterOnlyLastRow join(Source_UserId == UserSk,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinDimUser
SrcDimUser filter(isNull(EndDate)) ~> FilterOnlyLastRow
DrvDateCols split(!isNull(UserId) && Source_Location != Location,
	disjoint: false) ~> CsRows@(SCD2Location, Upsert)
JoinDimUser derive(NewStartDate = currentUTC(),
		NewEndDate = currentUTC()) ~> DrvDateCols
CsRows@SCD2Location alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterUpdateOldRow
CsRows@Upsert alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterUpsert
SrcUsers select(mapColumn(
		Source_AboutMe = {_AboutMe},
		Source_AccountId = {_AccountId},
		Source_CreationDate = {_CreationDate},
		Source_DisplayName = {_DisplayName},
		Source_UserId = {_Id},
		Source_Location = {_Location}
	)) ~> SelectCleaningName
AlterUpdateOldRow sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UserId'],
	mapColumn(
		UserId,
		EndDate = NewEndDate
	)) ~> DestUpdateOldRows
AlterUpsert sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['UserSk'],
	mapColumn(
		UserSk = Source_UserId,
		AccountId = Source_AccountId,
		DisplayName = Source_DisplayName,
		Location = Source_Location,
		StartDate = NewStartDate
	)) ~> DestUpsert
CsRows@SCD2Location sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		UserSk = Source_UserId,
		AccountId = Source_AccountId,
		DisplayName = Source_DisplayName,
		Location = Source_Location,
		StartDate = NewStartDate
	)) ~> DestNewHistoricalRow
